content: कल्माष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (षी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Variegated, spotted. {@--2@} Black and white. --षः {@--1@} The variegated colour. {@--2@} A mixture of black and white. {@--3@} A demon, goblin. {@--4@} The black colour. {@--5@} A form of Agni. {@--6@} A kind of fragrant rice. --षी {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the river Yamunā {@--2@} The spotted cow of Jamadagni. --षं Stain.
